text:
[Verse]
Morning light in my eyes
Waking up to the skies
Feel the warmth on my face
New day’s here life's a race

[Verse 2]
Birds are singing so sweet
Dancin' down the city street
Joy in every step we take
Every dawn a chance to make

[Chorus]
Sunshine smile shine so bright
Chase away the darkest night
With your glow make it right
Sunshine smile in your light

[Verse 3]
From the hills to the bay
Love and laughter pave the way
Simple moments pure and true
Everyday begins with you

[Verse 4]
Raindrops can fall but it’s fine
Your smile melts them with its shine
Even when the clouds appear
Your light always brings good cheer

[Bridge]
Through the highs and the lows
In your smile the strength shows
No matter what comes to play
You make it a brighter day
title: Sunshine Smile
